channel.title: What to get for Christmas?
channel.description:
Decided on getting a PS3 -- thanks guys.
Also i am getting a new tv because my old one is 15 years old now. So post some good tvs that are cheap :)

item.title: What to get for Christmas?
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

ryanz321:

silver most people buy presents for each other. just my parents spend alot more moeny on me than i do on them.

Nice lol…

Well, If it was me personally, I would get a PS3, mainly because it can already read things like bluRay disks, and it can be digitally moded to act like a computer but for a TV. Unfortunately I am not into console games anymore, so I would buy neither. I do have a PSP though

Read full topic

item.title: What to get for Christmas?
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:14, topic:162308”]Maybe so Silver Lining, but what good does it do you if you refuse to accept presents people have spent money on for you? Assuming you’re in an environment where buying each other presents is mutual, which most people are.[/quote]If you accept the presents and take for granted that you will receive them, you also have that same responsibility to give gifts pushed on you, do you not?

Read full topic

item.title: What to get for Christmas?
item.dc:creator: @ryanz321 ryanz321
item.description:
@ryanz321 wrote:

ps3 is more reliable IMO in the long run ps3 is guna be the better deal i recon.

o an for the tv. i recently got a 42" plasma for 1800 it was good deal compared to the others. yeh i would also recommend plasma rather than lcd. (its a samsung)

Read full topic

item.title: What to get for Christmas?
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:16, topic:162308”][quote author=Martin link=topic=220740.msg1912513#msg1912513 date=1196735244]
Get a ps3. Halo 3 is shit. My xbox has broken down twice in the last 3 months. My ps3 has never broke.
[/quote]

My xbox never broke. My ps3 never worked.[/quote]

Then it was obviously faulty if you had bought it new. I’m sure if you took it back to the shop or wrote to sony they would have sent you a new one. The chances your second one would brake before use would be minimal.

The chances of your xbox overheating are 99%. Though you do get a 3 year guarantee with the xbox. It’s just all the hastle of sending it away with the courier.

Read full topic

item.title: What to get for Christmas?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Maybe so Silver Lining, but what good does it do you if you refuse to accept presents people have spent money on for you? Assuming you’re in an environment where buying each other presents is mutual, which most people are.

item.title: What to get for Christmas?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:12, topic:162308”][quote author=Silver Lining link=topic=220740.msg1911714#msg1911714 date=1196671348]
Perhaps you shouldn’t view Christmas as a commercial holiday. No one has an obligation to buy you a $400 entertainment system.
[/quote]Agreed. In my family we buy presents out of tradition, but never anything expensive (ie, over $40), and things we buy aren’t from big companies. Why support the capitalism?[/quote]

its not a obligation… my parents want to get me something… Like my parents want to get me a $2000 trumpet when i told them i can use my old one…

Read full topic

[/quote]

and its harder to brake and its sexy

@Noob_Slayerz wrote:

Know what, IMO both are good. I would rather get a 360 though. Assassins creed got rated 3 times on TV commercial that I saw it was…

10/10
5/5
5/5

Amazing, but it is for both systems.

item.title: What to get for Christmas?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

.Flair:

I was on this topic not too long ago for my Christmas. I decided on a Play Station 3. One of the only reasons to get XBox 360 is for Halo 3, it’s fun, but really, a Play Station offers way better graphics, Assassin’s Creed, Ratchet and Clank, Grand Theft Auto IV, and alot of other good titles. I’ve always like Sony more than Microsoft though, as far as gaming consoles.

same here. But assassins Creed comes on Xbox aswell… Never played Ratchet and Clank. And i think GTA IV is coming out on Xbox to.

Read full topic
